publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3423.3 Tommy Sheridan: Race Equality-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3423) in the name of Ms Margaret Curran, insert at end "condemns the recent statements made by the Home Secretary, David Blunkett, as being damaging to race relations and believes that, in particular, his remarks about schools and asylum seekers, Asians talking English at home and refugees returning to their countries have encouraged racism rather than contributed to reducing it."
